specialRules.name: Fluid Formation
specialRules.description: This Regiment may perform a free additional Reform Action during its Activation. This free Reform Action must be performed before the Regiment takes its first Action, or at the end of its Activation after all other Actions have been resolved.

specialRules.name: Vanguard (3)
specialRules.description: When a Regiment with this Special Rule enters the Battlefield from Reinforcements, add +3 to its March Characteristic for the first March Action this Activation.

specialRules.name: Barrage (3) (16")
specialRules.description: A Stand with this Special Rule contributes 3 Shots when its Regiment performs a Volley Action at 16" range.

specialRules.name: Leader
specialRules.description: A command stand containing a leader adds +1 attack to the command stands characteristic profile.

specialRules.name: Advanced Scout Training
specialRules.description: Should this Regiment has the [Veteran] Battlefield Role, it always counts as Obscured against Enemy Volley Actions.

specialRules.name: Barrage (3) (16", Armor Piercing (1))
specialRules.description: A Stand with this Special Rule contributes 3 Shots when its Regiment performs a Volley Action at 16" range with Armor Piercing (1).

specialRules.name: Leader
specialRules.description: A command stand containing a leader adds +1 attack to the command stands characteristic profile.

specialRules.name: Standard Bearer
specialRules.description: A regiment with a Standard Bearer gains the unstoppable special rule.

specialRules.name: Advanced Target Training
specialRules.description: Should this Regiment has the [Veteran] Battlefield Role, when its Stands contribute Shots against a Target within Effective Range they add +1 to their Volley Characteristic until the end of that Action.

name: Hunter Cadre

specialRules.name: Barrage (3) (16", Armor Piercing (1))
specialRules.description: A Stand with this Special Rule contributes 3 Shots when its Regiment performs a Volley Action at 16" range with Armor Piercing (1).

specialRules.name: Cleave (1)
specialRules.description: When a Stand with this Special Rule performs a Clash or Duel Action, any Hits caused by those Attacks reduce the Target's Defense by 1.

specialRules.name: Fearless
specialRules.description: A Regiment with this Special Rule ignores the effects of the Fearsome and Terrifying (X) Special Rules.

specialRules.name: Fiend Hunter
specialRules.description: Stands with this Special Rule may Re-Roll all failed Hit Rolls against Monster and Brute Regiments.

specialRules.name: Flank
specialRules.description: This Regiment does not contribute a die to the Reinforcement Roll.

specialRules.name: Leader
specialRules.description: A command stand containing a leader adds +1 attack to the command stands characteristic profile.

specialRules.name: Standard Bearer
specialRules.description: A regiment with a Standard Bearer gains the unstoppable special rule.

officerUpgrades: Any Hunter Cadre Regiment may take the following Officer: Null Mage (20 points)

name: Men-At-Arms

specialRules.name: Shield
specialRules.description: Stands in this Regiment count their Defense Characteristic as 1 point higher against all Hits originating from the Regiment's front Arc.

specialRules.name: Leader
specialRules.description: A command stand containing a leader adds +1 attack to the command stands characteristic profile.

specialRules.name: Standard Bearer
specialRules.description: A regiment with a Standard Bearer gains the unstoppable special rule.

specialRules.name: Advanced Infantry Training
specialRules.description: Should this Regiment has the [Veteran] Battlefield Role, it gains the Support (+1) Special Rule. If the Regiment does not already have the Support (X) Special Rule it gains the Support (2) Special Rule instead.

officerUpgrades: Any Men-At-Arms Regiment may take the following Officer: Neophyte (20 points), Seasoned Veteran (15 points)

name: Gilded Legion

specialRules.name: Cleave (1)
specialRules.description: When a Stand with this Special Rule performs a Clash or Duel Action, any Hits caused by those Attacks reduce the Target's Defense by 1.

specialRules.name: Iron Discipline
specialRules.description: When this Regiment is Engaged or suffers Wounds from the Sides or Rear, it does not lose the Support (X) Special Rule and does not Re-Roll successful Morale Tests.

specialRules.name: Support (3)
specialRules.description: This Regiment's Stands contribute 3 Supporting Attacks during a Clash Action instead of 1.

specialRules.name: Pike Formation
specialRules.description: Enemy Regiments suffer -3 to their Impact (X) Special Rule (to a minimum of 0) when in contact with this Regiment's front arc. In addition, Enemy Regiments that have performed a successful Charge against this Regiment's front arc do not benefit from the Inspired and Shock Special Rules until the end of the Round.

specialRules.name: Leader
specialRules.description: A command stand containing a leader adds +1 attack to the command stands characteristic profile.

specialRules.name: Standard Bearer
specialRules.description: A regiment with a Standard Bearer gains the unstoppable special rule.

drawEvents.name: Bastion (1)
drawEvents.description: Until the end of the Round, all Stands in this Regiment gain +1 Defense.

officerUpgrades: Any Gilded Legion Regiment may take the following Officer: Drillmaster (20 points)

name: Steel Legion

specialRules.name: Bravery
specialRules.description: Stands in this Regiment ignore the Fearsome and Terrifying (X) Special Rules. In addition, at the start of the Regiment's Activation, remove the Broken status from this Regiment.

specialRules.name: Cleave (2)
specialRules.description: When a Stand with this Special Rule performs a Clash or Duel Action, any Hits caused by those Attacks reduce the Target's Defense by 2.

specialRules.name: Hardened (1)
specialRules.description: When this Regiment makes a Defense Roll, reduce any Cleave (X), Brutal Impact (X) or Armor Piercing (X) Special Rule by 1.

specialRules.name: Oblivious
specialRules.description: Regiments with this Special Rule receive only 1 Wound for every 2 failed Morale Tests, rounding up.

specialRules.name: Support (2)
specialRules.description: This Regiment's Stands contribute 2 Supporting Attacks during a Clash Action instead of 1.

specialRules.description: When a Regiment with this Special Rule is the Target of a Priest (X)'s Spellcasting Action, one failed Spellcasting die is converted to a success.

specialRules.description: When this Regiment becomes the Target of a Friendly Theist Priest's Spell, during its Activation the Regiment may choose to either add +2" to its first March Action OR +2" to its Charge Distance until the end of the Round.

specialRules.description: Regiments in contact with Stands with this Special Rule reduce their Resolve Characteristic by 1.

specialRules.name: The Spirit Glimmers
specialRules.description: Friendly Regiments currently within 12" of the Archangel count their Divine Purpose Special Rule as active regardless of whether the Regiment has been the Target of a Theist Priest's Spell or not.

specialRules.name: Aspect Choice
specialRules.description: The Archangel must select either Aspect of the Avenger or Aspect of the Redeemer.

specialRules.name: Fluid Formation
specialRules.description: This Regiment may perform a free additional Reform Action during its Activation. This free Reform Action must be performed before the Regiment takes its first Action, or at the end of its Activation after all other Actions have been resolved.

specialRules.description: Stands in this Regiment count their Defense Characteristic as 1 point higher against all Hits originating from the Regiment's front Arc.

specialRules.name: Standard Bearer
specialRules.description: A regiment with a Standard Bearer gains the unstoppable special rule.

specialRules.name: Blessed
specialRules.description: Once per Round, Stands with this Special Rule may choose to Re-Roll all their failed Hit Rolls or all of their failed Defense Rolls during a Clash or Charge Action.

specialRules.name: Cleave (1)
specialRules.description: When a Stand with this Special Rule performs a Clash or Duel Action, any Hits caused by those Attacks reduce the Target's Defense by 1.

specialRules.name: Standard Bearer

specialRules.description: When a Stand with this Special Rule inflicts Impact Attacks, those Impact Attacks reduce the Target Enemy Regiment's Defense by 2.

specialRules.name: Impact (4)
specialRules.description: Stands with this Special Rule perform Impact Attacks equal to 4.

specialRules.name: Shield
specialRules.description: Stands in this Regiment count their Defense Characteristic as 1 point higher against all Hits originating from the Regiment's front Arc.

specialRules.name: Terrifying (1)
specialRules.description: Regiments in contact with Stands with this Special Rule reduce their Resolve Characteristic by 1.

specialRules.name: Wedge!
specialRules.description: After performing a successful Charge, this Regiment gains the Cleave (+1) Special Rule until the end of the Round.

specialRules.name: Devastating Charge
specialRules.description: Should the Regiment perform a March Action immediately followed by a Charge Action, the Regiment gains the Impact (+1) and Linebreaker Special Rules.

specialRules.name: Leader
specialRules.description: A command stand containing a leader adds +1 attack to the command stands characteristic profile.

specialRules.name: Standard Bearer
specialRules.description: A regiment with a Standard Bearer gains the unstoppable special rule.

specialRules.name: Forward Force
specialRules.description: The non-Monster Regiment this Character Stand is currently attached to gains the Flank Special Rule.

specialRules.name: Battlefield Drills
specialRules.description: At the end of the Round's Supremacy Phase select up to two target Friendly Infantry Regiments within 12" of this [Character] Stand can each receive one of the following benefits: Brace for Impact, On Your Feet, Point Secure, or Aim For the Head.

specialRules.name: Barrage (4) (18")
specialRules.description: A Stand with this Special Rule contributes 4 Shots when its Regiment performs a Volley Action at 18" range.

specialRules.name: Wizard (6)
specialRules.description: This Regiment or Character Stand can perform the Spellcasting Action during its Activation. The X value is this Stand's Magic Level.

specialRules.name: Personal Bodyguard
specialRules.description: You may select an Infantry Regiment in this Character's Warband to gain the [Veteran] Battlefield Role if they do not already have it.

specialRules.name: Weapon Arts
specialRules.description: May select two of the following Weapon Arts, gaining the listed Special Rule(s).

specialRules.name: Brutal Impact (2)
specialRules.description: When a Stand with this Special Rule inflicts Impact Attacks, those Impact Attacks reduce the Target Enemy Regiment's Defense by 2.

specialRules.name: Impact (3)
specialRules.description: Stands with this Special Rule perform Impact Attacks equal to 3.

specialRules.name: Shield
specialRules.description: Stands in this Regiment count their Defense Characteristic as 1 point higher against all Hits originating from the Regiment's front Arc.

specialRules.name: Personal Entourage
specialRules.description: You may select a Household Knight Regiment in this Character's Warband to gain the [Veteran] Battlefield Role if they do not already have it.

specialRules.name: Weapon Arts
specialRules.description: May select up to one of the following Weapon Arts, gaining the listed Special Rule(s).

specialRules.name: Cleave (2)
specialRules.description: When a Stand with this Special Rule performs a Clash or Duel Action, any Hits caused by those Attacks reduce the Target's Defense by 2.

specialRules.name: Flurry
specialRules.description: A Stand with this Special Rule Re-Rolls all failed Hit Rolls when performing a Clash or Duel Action.

specialRules.name: Devout
specialRules.description: When a Regiment with this Special Rule is the Target of a Priest (X)'s Spellcasting Action, one failed Spellcasting die is converted to a success.

specialRules.name: Path of Righteousness
specialRules.description: Regiments in this [Character]'s Warband gain the [Theist] Battlefield Role and Indomitable (+1) Special Rule (to a maximum of 2).

specialRules.name: Crusading Bulls
specialRules.description: May select one of the following Crusading Bulls gaining the listed Special Rule(s).

specialRules.name: Cleave (1)
specialRules.description: When a Stand with this Special Rule performs a Clash or Duel Action, any Hits caused by those Attacks reduce the Target's Defense by 1.

specialRules.name: Devout
specialRules.description: When a Regiment with this Special Rule is the Target of a Priest (X)'s Spellcasting Action, one failed Spellcasting die is converted to a success.

specialRules.name: Fearless
specialRules.description: A Regiment with this Special Rule ignores the effects of the Fearsome and Terrifying (X) Special Rules.

specialRules.name: Priest (6)
specialRules.description: This Regiment or Character Stand can perform the Spellcasting Action during its Activation. The X value is this Stand's Magic Level.

specialRules.name: Impact (4)
specialRules.description: Stands with this Special Rule perform Impact Attacks equal to 4.

specialRules.name: Order Choice
specialRules.description: The Character must belong in one of the following Orders gaining its benefits.

name: Errant of the Order of the Shield

specialRules.name: Cleave (2)
specialRules.description: When a Stand with this Special Rule performs a Clash or Duel Action, any Hits caused by those Attacks reduce the Target's Defense by 2.

specialRules.name: Shield
specialRules.description: Stands in this Regiment count their Defense Characteristic as 1 point higher against all Hits originating from the Regiment's front Arc.

specialRules.name: Up In Arms!
specialRules.description: This [Character] may add one additional Mainstay Regiment in their Warband, ignoring the usual allowance of four Regiments per Warband, to a maximum of five. Infantry Regiments in this [Character]'s Warband gain the [Veteran] Battlefield Role.

specialRules.name: Drive for Justice
specialRules.description: The Infantry Regiment this [Character] is currently attached to gains the Fearless Special Rule.

specialRules.name: Like Gods Among Men
specialRules.description: [Always Active]: When a Friendly Cavalry [The Orders] Regiment successfully completes a Charge against an Enemy Regiment, all Infantry Regiments currently within 8" of that Friendly [The Orders] Regiment immediately perform a free, out-of-sequence Rally or Combat Rally Action and gain the Inspired Special Rule until the end of the Round.
